name: The Adventure Of Bubulous
description:
This is just a very, very early version of possibly a game. This uses a base of Kenney Asset Pack V1. If you want to be a boss and me to love you, leave a small tip, DO NOT FEEL THAT YOU NEED TO.

DONATE HERE: https://www.paypal.me/MrSuperEpicMan

Current Build: Build3

NEW FEATURES: Bug Within The Pause Menu, Spikes, Health System, Death :)
